[[=]]
**SCP-5300** - //Ship in a Bottle//
Written by [[*user MirageTD]] and [[*user Habitual_Snubnose]]
[[/=]]
------
= **Images (in order of appearance)**
SCP Location Starchart - Generated with [[[https://github.com/dcf21/star-charter | the StarCharter tool]]], written by Dominic Ford
[[[https://plus.maths.org/content/imaging-maths-inside-klein-bottle | Klein Bottle with Möbius Band]]] - Doctor Konrad Polthier, Freie Universität Berlin (used with [[file Klein-Bottle_permission.pdf | written permission]] as per [[[https://plus.maths.org/content/terms-use-and-notices | the terms of plus.maths.org]]])
------
= **Critters**
Many thanks to [[*user Dyslexion]], [[*user CaliBold]], [[*user DrAkimoto]], [[*user stormbreath]], OriCat, [[*user gee0765]] and [[*user Uncannyon]] for providing critique and feedback.
------
= **Miscellaneous Credits**
The end of the fourth paragraph in the introductory email is a paraphrase from [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/about-the-scp-foundation#wiki-tab-0-0 | the Administrator's note]]].
The "Vietnam book" Zajic refers to is //The Things They Carried//, by Tim O'Brien.
------
